name: Old Sam: The Bridgebuilder
overview: You play "Old Sam" a hard working man who specializes in building and repairing bridges. Your goal is to take the pieces from the left side of the screen one by one and finish building the bridge to cross over to the castle. However, it's not as simple as it sounds as giant rocks are falling from the sky, and you must finish the bridge before either 1. the time runs out or 2. You lose all your lives by getting crushed to death by the boulders. This game was developed by Roland Kunz and released by BB Software. The actual release year is not currently known.
